message: Resource type naming must follow camel case. Path: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/providers/Microsoft.Network/IpAllocations'
Resource type naming must follow camel case. Path: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/providers/Microsoft.Network/locations/{location}/CheckDnsNameAvailability'
Resource type naming must follow camel case. Path: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/IpAllocations'
Resource type naming must follow camel case. Path: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/IpAllocations/{ipAllocationName}'
